dt: {bc}a fleshy European seacoast plant ({it}Crithmum maritimum{/it}) of the carrot family that is sometimes pickled
{bc}a common glasswort ({it}Salicornia europaea{/it}) that is sometimes pickled

et: alteration of earlier {it}sampiere{/it}, from Middle French ({it}herbe de{/it}) {it}Saint Pierre{/it}, literally, St. Peter's herb
shortdef: a fleshy European seacoast plant (Crithmum maritimum) of the carrot family that is sometimes pickled
a common glasswort (Salicornia europaea) that is sometimes pickled
